code:
#Create a dictionary of items
my_dict = {
    "item1": "apple",
    "item2": "banana",
    "item3": "carrot"
}

#Access and print the items in the dictionary
for key, value in my_dict.items(): 
    print(key, ":", value) 
    
#Add a new item to the dictionary
my_dict["item4"] = "dates"

#Print the updated dictionary
print(my_dict)
